answer:
In BC, influenza season (and your risk of illness from influenza) is between October and April each year. At this time, the influenza vaccine would not be recommended. Mark your calendar for October 2018 as a reminder to get the 2018/19 influenza vaccine. Learn more about influenza and the vaccine here.
Immunization Nurse
question: Even though it is June, can I still be vaccinated with last flu season's version of the flu vaccine?
question_variation_0: can flu season vaccines be vaccinated
question_variation_1: when can flu season still be vaccinated
question_variation_2: can i still be vaccined from flu vaccine season
